name: PETLIBRO Automatic Cat Feeder with Camera for Two Cats, 1080P HD Video with Night Vision, 5G WiFi Pet Feeder with Phone APP Control, 2-Way Audio for Cat & Dog, Low Food & Motion & Sound Alerts
short_description: Smart APP Control: PETLIBRO automatic cat feeder with Camera is 5GHz and 2.4GHz WiFi-enabled, allowing you to program and monitor your pet's meals anywhere, anytime through the PETLIBRO App for iOS and Android phones.You can set a feeding plan and schedule feeding time for two pets, up to 6 meals per day with 1-50 portions per meal. The feeding log can be used to check whether your pet is being fed according to the schedule you set. The feeder can be controlled by up to 5 people's smartphones

1080P HD Camera for Remote Monitoring: The PETLIBRO smart pet feeder with camera features a high resolution 1080P HD camera with 145° wide viewing angle, allowing you to see&hear your beloved pets and care their eating remotely while on the go. Videos can be saved on micro SD cards up to 256G or cloud storage for an extra pay online. The built-in camera supports IR night vision for clear monitoring in the dark, helping you learn your pet's eating habits through video playback in the APP

Two-way Audio & Personalized Meal Call: PETLIBRO automatic pet feeder for cat and dog with built-in advanced microphone and speaker allow you to keep in touch with your pet baby anywhere anytime. Record a voice message(up to 10s) that plays at mealtime, and set the times(0-5) the meal call play, deliver reminders or just send an “I love you”. The old one is deleted when a new voice recording is done. Easily check the food level through the transparent window and add food in time

Secure Cloud Storage Available: The PETLIBRO app provides a secure cloud storage service where you can store the videos captured by the Granary camera feeder. This service ensures that your videos are stored securely and can be accessed whenever you need them. Additionally, the app utilizes advanced AI algorithms to recognize pets in the videos, making it convenient for you to find and download specific pet videos

Motion Detection & Smart Notifications: Once senses movement, the camera records and saves videos of your pets’ activities. You’ll even get alerts on your phone so you can watch in real-time. You can adjust the sensitivity and the viewing ranges as needed. Your phone gets notifications when the food/battery level is low, when a blockage occurs, WiFi is disconnected, the feeder stops working or has other problems. The infrared sensor keeps checking and stops food dispensing if it blocked outlet

name: Automatic Cat Feeder for 3 Cats, 6L/25 Cups Smart WiFi Pet Feeder, Strong Anti-Jam System, Dual-Effect Desiccant Cat Food Dispenser, with 10S Voice Recorder for Cats and Small Dog(Black)
short_description: 3-Bowl Split Automatic Feeder System: This innovative cat feeder automatic design lets you choose between 3, 2 or 1 bowls, perfect for multi-pet homes. Adjust the portions per meal (1-20 servings) according to your own needs.
Jam-Proof Pet Food Dispenser: Our advanced anti-jam mechanism in this auto cat feeder ensures smooth food delivery every time, while keeping pests out of your pet supplies.
Fresh-Keep Technology: The automatic pet feeder features dual-effect desiccant to maintain food freshness in this smart cat food dispenser. with a color indicator for easy replacement.
Voice Calling & Emergency Power: Record a 10-second message to call your pet to meals. Equipped with AAA batteries for up to 7 days of backup during power outages(batteries not included)
6L Capacity Storage: This cat automatic feeder can store 25 cups of food, which can reduce the frequency of your refilling. It can be suitable for multiple cats to eat together.
Smart WiFi Control: Manage feeding schedules remotely through the pet feeder's app (2.4G WiFi). This automatic dog feeder alternative works great for cats too.

name: PAPIFEED 2.4G WiFi Automatic Cat Feeder, 6L/25Cup Automatic Pet Feeder with APP Control for Remote Feeding, Detachable for Easy Clean, Cat Food Dispenser with Alexa,1-30 Meals Per Day for Dog, Black
short_description: Multiple Scenario Missions : We can change our stereotypical feeding schedule by setting up scenario mission on the application. When the timed cat feeder's usage scenario changes, wifi auto cat feeder automatically performs the scenario mission. For example, the automatic dry food dispenser will add more food for our cat when the weather is cold and the intake demand of our pets increases.

Remote APP Control : Smart automatic cat feeders can connect to 2.4GHz network. Program and monitor your pet's meals anywhere anytime through the “Smart Life” App on your iOS or Android smartphone. You can set up a feeding schedule of up to 30 meals per day, with 1-12 portions per meal. Also reward your pet by feeding it remotely from outdoor via the app.

Easy to Clean & Slow Feeder : The automatic cat food dispenser （BPA-Free） has a removable food tank and stainless steel bowl. This provides easy cleaning of the food tank and stainless steel bowl, as well as a healthy and hygienic feeding environment. Our auto pet feeders not only focus on how to reduce the feeding workload of pet owners, but also care about the hygiene of pets in feeding. When your cat is bloated, you can manually feed through the " Feed " button in the APP, helping greedy cats eat at a healthier rate.

Ortion Control :6L（25 Cup） capacity food storage with desiccant bags automatically and continuously provides your cat and dog with fresh food for several weeks. The 360° transparent food bin facilitates us to visually observe the food consumption.

Support Alexa & Dual Power Supply : Ask your Amazon Echo device to feed your dog a snack hands-free, from anywhere in your home. Nor do you have to worry about your pet's feeding anymore. Leave everything to PAPIFEED cat feeders for indoor cats. PAPIFEED smart pet feeder has two sets of power supply system. The DC 5V power adapter ensures stable daily operation of the feeder. 4 AA batteries will ensure your beloved pet gets a continuous supply of food in the event of a power outage at home. With a complete power supply system, you can enjoy your vacation or work outside to your heart's content.

name: HoneyGuaridan 6L Automatic Cat Feeder for 2 Cats, 2.4G WiFi Enabled Smart Feed Automatic Pet Feeder for Cats & Dogs, Timed Pet Food Dispenser with Stainless Steel Bowl APP Control, 10s Voice Recorder
short_description: 【WiFi Automatic Cat Feeders - APP Remote Controls Feeding】The cat automatic feeder connects fast and stably to 2.4GHz network via bluetooth permission. It only takes 30 seconds to set a feeding schedule on the app, which is much easier than using the button model. You can feed your pets anytime, anywhere on your smartphone and view the feeding log on App to make sure the automated cat feeders is working as scheduled.

【6L Visible Hopper & Feed 2 Pets】You can set 1-6 meals per day and up to 24 portions of dry food per meal at scheduled times depending on your pet’s needs. 1 portion is about 6g (may vary by kibble size). The timer cat feeder can store 2.2KG of pet food with the two-way food dispenser split meals in half evenly. You can feed 2 cats at same time at the cost of one device. What's more, the auto pet feeder can be switched between 1 bowl and 2 bowls.

【Ensure Freshness】The cat feeder automatic with timer contains desiccant bag and sealing strip to keep food fresh and crunchy.And safety sliding lock lid makes it impossible for pets to open and sneak into the cat food dispenser for extra food.Food grade stainless steel bowl is removable for cleaning, ensuring health and hygiene and keeping your pet away from chin acne.

【10s Personalized Meal Call】You can record a personal voice up to 10s to call your pets to eat and set the number of times (0 - 6) to play the recordings on App. The cat feeders automatic also supports disabling the speaker function when you need more sleep and not be disturbed on weekends.

【Dual Power Supply】The timed cats feeder can be powered by DC power adapter and 3 alkaline D-size batteries (Battery NOT Included). We recommend using both battery and adapter. In the event of a power outage, the automatic dog feeder will continue to run on 3 D-size batteries to ensure your pets never miss a meal.

name: Automatic Cat Feeder 2 Cats - 5G WiFi Pet Feeder with APP Control, 6L Dry Food Dog Feeder with Low Food & Blockage Alarms, 1-10 Meals Per Day
short_description: Smart APP Control: Molypet automatic cat feeder can connect to 5GHz and 2.4GHz WiFi network. You can set up a feeding plan and schedule up to 10 meals per day with 1-50 portions per meal for your pets through the smart APP, which means never miss a meal of your pets

Multiple Cat Feeder - Molypet pet feeder features an adjustable two-way splitter that dispenses equal or unequal amounts into two bowls. Feed multiple pets at the same time without waiting and fighting for food

Smart Alarm Notification: When the wifi cat feeder is blocked, short of food, empty of food or low battery, you will receive an alarm on your APP in time.The infrared sensor keeps checking and stops food dispensing if the food outlet is blocked

6L Capacity Storage - This cat automatic feeder can store 25.4 cups of food, which can reduce the frequency of your refilling. And it has a triple seal to ensure that the food will not get wet , your pets will be able to eat fresh food every day

External Power or Backup Battery: Coming with a 5V USB adapter and 6.6FT cable, the pet feeder also can be powered by 3 alkaline D-cell batteries (not included) for backup in case of power failure. Recommended dual power supply, automatic feeder with battery backup that will keep dispensing while offline

name: PETKIT Automatic Cat Feeder with Camera, 1080P HD Video with Night Vision, 2.4G WiFi Pet Feeder for Cat & Small Dog, 2-Way Audio & Meal Call Pet Food Dispenser with Desiccant Bag, Motion Capturing
short_description: 1080P HD Camera for Convenient Monitoring: The PETKIT automatic pet feeder features a 1080P high resolution and 140° wide viewing angle AI-powered camera, allowing you to see and hear your fur babies anytime anywhere and know they are being well fed. The built-in camera supports IR night vision for easily capturing the movement of pets in the dark. Videos can be saved on secure cloud storage for easy viewing anytime (Certain services need to be purchased in the app).

Clear Pet Vlog: The AI-powered camera captures and records your pet's activities, from playful antics to satisfying meals, providing a clear overview of their activities. Scroll in the timeline to review valuable clips, it's like having a pet vlog. The captured motion is automatically classified into three categories: Feeding, Eating, and Pet Visiting. Quickly locate what you want to see through the timeline.

Smart App Control: With this 2.4GHz Wi-Fi enabled pet feeder, you can set up personalized feeding plan for your beloved pets. Flexible feeding times and precise portion control (1-5 portions) help pets develop healthy dietary habits. Pop-up notifications on the phone will alert you in the event of food shortage, power failure, or other problems. Set the camera's operating time and disable voice recording via the app, so you can take full control of your privacy.

Two-way Audio and Meal Call: You are able to call your cat over and interact in real-time, delight in the experience of remotely interacting with your pets that most feeders don't offer. You can also record a personalized voice message within 20 seconds, it will be played automatically while dispensing food to remind your pets that it's mealtime. (Set up to 5 messages, if you want to set more than 5 messages, delete the old before the new messages done.)

Large Capacity and More Compatibility: The capacity of 3L (12-cup) is estimated to store about 1.33kg (2.9 lbs) of food, which is enough to feed an adult cat for 15 days. The PETKIT YumShare Solo auto cat feeder is compatible with freeze-dried food,mixed food,dry food,air-dried food,that the size of the kibble should not exceed 12mm (0.47in). Anti-blockage design ensures accurate distribution of each meal and smooth food delivery.

Freshness in Every Bite: Triple fresh-lock systems prevent moisture and keep food dry and fresh. Dual power supply systems ensure your fur friends will never miss a meal. With non-stick coating makes the 304 stainless steel feeding bowl easy to clean and anti-stick.

name: PETLIBRO Automatic Cat Feeder, 5G WiFi Automatic Dog Feeder with Freshness Preservation, 5L Timed Cat Feeder with Low Food Sensor, Up to 10 Meals Per Day, Granary Pet Feeder for Cats, Black
short_description: Smart APP Control: Wi-Fi fully automatic dog feeder is 5GHz and 2.4GHz WiFi-enabled allowing you to program your pet's meals anywhere anytime through the PETLIBRO App on your iOS or Android smartphone.

Never Miss A Meal: Easily schedule up to 10 meals per day and 1-48 portions per meal (1/12 cup each portion) with the Wi-Fi automatic cat feeder, you can easily customize your furry friend's feeding plan and check the feeding records to ensure your cat has been fed on a set schedule by the APP.

Personalized Meal Call: Record a voice message for up to 10 seconds that plays for each feeding, and freely set the times the meal call play, so your pet can feel your care even when you're not at home. Not only that, but the thoughtful automatic cat food dispenser provides you with the ability to record up to 10 customized meal calls and adjust the volume to your needs!

Freshness in Every Bite: Patent rotor in the tank base and twist-lock lid of the automatic pet feeder prevent pets sneaking into the food dispenser for extra food. Built-in desiccant bag and sealing strip keep food fresh and crunchy. Food-grade stainless steel bowl provides healthy and hygienic feeding, saving your pets from chin acne.

Smart Notifications and Indicators: Your phone receives notifications and the machine’s indicators also lights up red when the food tank of the cat feeder automatic is empty, food gets jammed, the battery is low, or has other problems. The infrared sensor keeps checking and stops food dispensing if the food outlet is blocked.

name: Automatic Dog Feeder with Camera WiFi: 33 Cups 5G App Control Easy Setup Cat Food Dispenser - HD 1080P Video Recording Timed Pet Feeder for Cat Dog Small-Pet
short_description: Large 8L Capacity: Automatic dog feeder holds up to 33 cups of dry food, perfect for dogs and cats. Ideal for busy pet owners, reducing the need for frequent refills

Smart App Control: Dog feeder automatic connect via WiFi to easily manage feeding schedules and portion sizes through the “Smart Life” app. Supports both 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks for seamless connectivity

HD Camera with Night Vision: Automatic cat feeder with camera equipped with a 1080p HD camera featuring a 150° wide-angle view and infrared night vision, allowing you to monitor your pets anytime, even in low light
Two-Way Audio Communication: Built-in microphone and speaker enable real-time interaction with your pets, providing comfort and connection when you're away

Food Freshness & Safety: Automatic cat feeder features a strong locking lid and desiccant bag to keep food fresh and prevent spills. Cat feeder made from BPA-free materials, ensuring a safe feeding environment
Reliable Dual Power: The dog food dispenser uses 3*D alkaline batteries as a backup power source to ensure uninterrupted feeding during power outages
Durable & Easy to Clean: Made from high-quality, durable materials. Easy to clean and maintain, this cat feeder is built to last and withstand daily use

Ideal For Multi-Pet Households & Pet Parents On The Go: Automatic pet feeder set up to 20 meals per day with adjustable portions to fit your pet’s needs. Great for multi-pet households or on-the-go pet owners

App Shareable For Family Members: Easily share app access with family or caregivers to manage feeding schedules and monitor pets. Ideal for busy households, offering flexibility and ensuring everyone stays connected with your pet
The cat food dispenser suits for small puppy, kitty, furbo pet, cat, medium-sized dog and other animals under 20kg.Multiple family members can control the dog feeder from their smartphones

name: Smart Automatic Cat Feeder - 6-L Reliable Automatic Cat Food Dispenser with Display LCD Screen for Easy Set Up - (White)
short_description: RELIABLE FEEDING - The automatic pet feeder will ensure your pet is fed at the designated time even when you're working overtime, vacationing, sleeping, or otherwise occupied. Holds 6L of pet food - 6 daily meals for 35 days for a cat and 20 days for a small dog - and you can set up to 9 portions per meal.

HEALTH and HYGIENE - The auto cat feeder dispenses a preset amount of cat food every meal, ensuring your cat eats balanced meals and doesn’t overeat. Kibble stays fresh and crisp in the enclosed desiccant bag, and you can use the manual button for extra treats.

SIMPLE SETUP - Simple-to-operate LCD screen and detailed instructions ensure you can effortlessly set up a timed cat feeder to meet your specific needs. Record a message of up to 10 seconds to call your pet for feeding time so it feels loved and cared for in your absence.

PET-SAFE DESIGN - The top of this pet feeder automatically locks so it’s impossible for your pet to tip it or push their paws in to grab food. The feeder has a nonslip bottom and additional stickers are provided to keep it stable when your pet tries to shake it.

DEPENDABLE POWER SUPPLY - The gravity feeder is equipped with dual power supply and a special memory setting so that your pet can continue self-feeding even in the event of a power outage. The bowl is dishwasher safe for effortless cleaning and maintenance.

name: PAPIFEED Automatic Cat Feeder 3.5L/15 Cup 2.4G WiFi Pet Feeder for Dog Work with Alexa & Echo Timed Cat Food Dispenser for Remote Feeding with Stainless Steel Bowl up to 10 Meals Per Day with APP
short_description: 【2.4G WIFI Remote APP Control】: When the automatic cat feeder is connected to the 2.4GHz WiFi, you can feed your pet anytime and anywhere via the "Smart Life" APP, no more worrying about your pet being home alone and not being fed. You can also set up a daily feeding schedule via the APP for regular feedings, relieving you of the burden of getting up early to feed. The "Smart Life" APP not only allows you to view feeding records, but also to share control with family members.（Note: Only supports 2.4GHZ not 5GHZ）

【Customized Healthy Diet】：Say no to your pet’s irregular healthy diet. Customize a healthy eating habit for your pet from now on. Easily set up and schedule feeding times based on your pet's needs, even while you're enjoying your vacation outdoors. papifeed automatic pet feeder creates a consistent daily feeding schedule to ensure your pet is eating regularly. (Max 10 meals per day, 1-6 servings each)

【Let Alexa Feed Your Pet】: Our auto cat feeder supports Echo devices with Alexa, with a simple command, you can let your Amazon Echo devices feed your pet anywhere in your home. And you can customize the voice commands and the number of servings you feed.

【Slow Feeder & Portion Control】 : When your cat or dog is bloated, you can manually feed through the " Feed " button in the APP, extend the feeding interval and control the portion size of each meal，helping greedy pets eat at a healthier rate. Portion control can help pets control their food intake, so that pets can develop good eating habits and not overeat and become overweight. You can set up a feeding schedule of up to 10 meals per day, with 1-6 portions per meal.

【Eat Fresh Food At Any Time】：PAPIFEED automatic pet feeder storage has an air-sealed design. Desiccant bags and safety-lock lids not only keep food fresh, they also prevent your pet from accessing stored food. At the same time, the 360° visual transparent trough design also facilitates us to visually observe food consumption.

【Dual Power Mode】:The PAPIFEED dog food dispenser has two power systems. You can use the DC 5V power adapter for long-term power or use 4 AA batteries（Battery not included）for regular power. Even if the power goes out, the automatic feeder with battery backup will continue feeding so your pet won't go hungry. If the power goes out and there is no battery inside, the meal settings will be remembered when the power comes back on.（Note: 4 AA batteries are not included. The battery is for emergency power supply and has a standby time of about 15 hours. It cannot be connected to the internet when using battery power）

【Easy to Clean ( BPA Free )】:The PAPIFEED cat food dispenser with timer comes with a food-grade, safe and odorless removable stainless steel bowl. It makes cleaning easier and keep your beloved pet's fur clean. PAPIFEED auto feeder not only cares about reducing the feeding workload of pet owners, but also cares about the hygiene of pets during the feeding process.

【One Year Warranty】 : PAPIFEED provides products with up to one year free warranty and always-on service. Hope all pet owners and cats have the most enjoyable purchase experience from us. Lighten the burden of pet care.
